pr_title: feat: add codeql-analysis.yml file to setup CodeQL code scanning

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if we should turn off Javascript... the JS we have in the repo is not really used / updated...
timeline.author: mortenoh
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,64 @@
+# For most projects, this workflow file will not need changing; you simply need
+# to commit it to your repository.
+#
+# You may wish to alter this file to override the set of languages analyzed,
+# or to provide custom queries or build logic.
+name: "CodeQL"
+
+on: [pull_request]
+
+jobs:
+  analyze:
+    name: Analyze
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+
+    strategy:
+      fail-fast: false
+      matrix:
+        # Override automatic language detection by changing the below list
+        # Supported options are ['csharp', 'cpp', 'go', 'java', 'javascript', 'python']
+        language: ['java', 'javascript']

timeline.message:
Update codeql-analysis.yml

Remove autobuild and JavaScript analysis

Update codeql-analysis.yml

Add back autobuild since it is required to build before analyze
